author: Special Correspondent
text:
Travancore Devaswom Board president Prayar Gopalakrishnan and memberAjay Tharayil said that the Pandalam-Pampa Thiruvabharanam path leading to Sabarimala would be developed into a ‘holy thiruvabharanam thaara’ before the next pilgrim season. The board would ensure basic facilities on the path before November. The encroachments on the path would be cleared, they said.

Mr. Gopalakrishnan said the board would issue special badges to all Ayyappa devotees accompanying the Thiruvabharanam procession from Pandalam to Sabarimala on foot from next year so that they could reach the Ayyappa temple premises directly, along with the procession, on the Makaravilakku day.Mr. Tharayil said TDB had launched an intensive waste clearing drive at Pampa and Sabarimala with the help of non-governmental organisationson Monday.
title: Thiruvabharanam path to be developed
